[[Category:Monsters]] {| style="background:#f5faff; border:1px solid #cedff2; width:auto; margin: 0px 5%; margin-bottom:1.25em; font-style:italic; text-align:left; color:#000; padding:1.5em 1em;" |- | | style="width: 100%;" | A small but dangerous dragon, puffing clouds of smoke. |} [[Category:Templates]] ==Useful Info== '''Fire drakes''' are one of the lesser kinds of [[list of dragons|dragon]], but they're still one of the more dangerous creatures one can encounter in [[the Lair]] since they are fast and have a fiery breath attack that does 3d12 [[fire]] damage. ==Spells== [[Category:Spellcaster]]
{| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:0; padding:0; width:28em;" ! colspan="3" style="font-size:larger;" | Spell set I |- ! align="left" | Slot1 | [[Fire Breath]] (3d12) | [[Spell slot flags|Natural flag]] |- |}
==Tips & Tricks== *If you have a source of fire resistance available, use it. At low levels, that breath can deal a serious amount of damage. ==History== Fire drakes were replaced by [[rime drake]]s in [[0.18]].
